Medical emergency instructions (direct to call emergency services)

metadata.author: Senior Laravel Architect + AI Product Designer + Senior AI Prompt Engineer + Senior Doctor
metadata.purpose: Global medical content generation rules - Specialties, Topics, and Content Types are managed in database
metadata.architecture: Hybrid System: Global rules (JSON) + Specialties/Topics/Content Types (Database)

database_tables.data_sources: Hybrid system combining JSON (global rules) with database (specialties, topics, content types). Content types are stored in 'content_types' and 'content_type_translations' tables.

metadata.workflow: User selects Language → Specialty → Topic → Content Type → System merges global rules + topic prompt_hint → AI generates compliant content
